title: Wall of Fire
tags: how to acquire wall of fire
content:
The Fiend Wall of Fire can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Light Domain, The Fiend

Wall of Fire Tips & Notes

Upcast: When cast with a 5th level spell slot or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th. ???

Lvl 4 Spells Banishment ♦ Blight ♦ Confusion ♦ Conjure Minor Elemental ♦ Conjure Woodland Beings ♦ Death Ward ♦ Dimension Door ♦ Dominate Beast ♦ Evard's Black Tentacles ♦ Fire Shield ♦ Freedom of Movement ♦ Gargoyle's Countenance
